source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_00<tab>Redolent Rose is furrowing his brow most furiously.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_00<tab>裁縫師ギルドのレドレント・ローズは、冒険者に噂話を聞かせたいようだ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_01<tab>Mamajaru, the wealthy Lalafell for whom you once crafted an acton, intends to propose to Kokomo. Upon learning of this, Wawarukka rushes to the guild, exclaiming that he must tell the girl how he feels before it's too late. To that end, he begs you and Redolent Rose for a set of fine garments so he can make the best possible impression. Craft and deliver a high-quality pair of patrician's bottoms, a high-quality patrician's wedge cap, and a high-quality patrician's coatee to Redolent Rose─the guildmaster will prepare the other pieces.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_01<tab>レドレント・ローズから依頼を受けた。ウルダハの裁縫師ギルドにいる「レドレント・ローズ」に「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3215)) 01 /var>」「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3475)) 01 /var>」「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2895)) 01 /var>」を1個ずつ納品しよう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_02<tab>Wawarukka is overjoyed by the ensemble you and the guildmaster have prepared. However, it may all be for naught─Kokomo is currently in the company of Mamajaru, and the guildmaster suspects that the proposal may be imminent. Wawarukka quickly departs for the Gold Court to see Kokomo, and Redolent Rose bids you follow to observe what transpires.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_02<tab>レドレント・ローズに<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3215)) 01 /var>、<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3475)) 01 /var>、<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2895)) 01 /var>を納品した。ウルダハのゴールドコートにいる「ワワルッカ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_03<tab>Though hesitant at first, Wawarukka rushes to Kokomo's side when Mamajaru attempts to strike her in a fit of anger. Filled with newfound confidence, he confronts the wealthy heir, who then flees. Now alone, Wawarukka and Kokomo stare deep into each other's eyes and begin a long-overdue conversation. Having observed that things are proceeding smoothly, you quietly excuse yourself. Return to the Weavers' Guild and tell Redolent Rose what you saw.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_03<tab>ワワルッカと話した。ウルダハの裁縫師ギルドにいる「レドレント・ローズ」に報告しよう。

source:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_04<tab>Upon hearing your account, Redolent Rose cannot help but laugh. Though clearly pleased to have helped the two young Lalafells, he asserts that he has acted only as a professional serving his clients. The future of Wawarukka and Kokomo's relationship is hardly certain, but he nevertheless compliments you on a job well done.

※The next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose once you have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SEQ_04<tab>レドレント・ローズに報告した。ワワルッカとココモの様子を聞いて、レドレント・ローズも安心したようだ。裁縫師の仕事とは、着る人の魅力を、最大限引き出して幸せにする服を作ること。これを達成した冒険者は、最高の裁縫師として、これからも多くの洋服を作り、多くの人を幸せにするだろう。一人でも多くの人に幸せを受け取ってもらうために、これからも裁縫師の仕事に励もう。

※以下の条件を満たすと、裁縫師ギルドのレドレント・ローズから、新たなクラスクエストを受注することができます。
1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_00<tab>Deliver a pair of patrician's bottoms <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>, a patrician's wedge cap <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>, and a patrician's coatee <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Redolent Rose.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_00<tab>レドレント・ローズに依頼品を納品

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_01<tab>Follow Wawarukka to the Gold Court.
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Redolent Rose.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_02<tab>レドレント・ローズに報告

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_03<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_04<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_05<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_06<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_07<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_08<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_09<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_10<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_11<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_12<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_13<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_14<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_15<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_16<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_17<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_18<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_19<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_20<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_21<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_22<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TODO_23<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_000<tab>If you've come in search of work, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I'm afraid I have nothing for you.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_000<tab>いらっしゃい、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>ちゃん、
今日は、まだあなた向きのお仕事がないのよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_001<tab>However, there is something I would like to discuss with you. It concerns Kokomo, and the young man currently courting her.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_001<tab>それより、ちょっと聞いて！
ホラ！　ママジャルぼっちゃまって覚えてる？
マテリアつきのアクトンを依頼してきたおぼっちゃんよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_002<tab>You see, it is none other than─
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_003<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Big Rose! Please, you gotta help me!
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_004<tab><pant> <pant> Clothes! I need new clothes!
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_004<tab>お願いだ！　俺に……洋服を作ってくれ！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_005<tab>Please, sir, you must get hold of yourself. Tell us what has driven you into this frenzy.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_005<tab>ワワルッカちゃん？
あなた……もしかして、あの話を聞いたの？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_006<tab>He's gonna... <pant> He's gonna propose to Kokomo! Mamajaru─he's gonna propose!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_006<tab>ココモさんの結婚話が進んでいるそうなんだ。
相手は、この前一緒に歩いていた男……
ママジャルっていう金持ちらしい。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_007<tab>I know it ain't my place, an' I might just be gettin' in the way─but dammit, I've gotta tell her how I feel before it's too late!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_007<tab>ココモさんの幸せを考えたら……
俺は何も言うべきじゃないのかもしれない。
でも……諦めきれないんだ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_008<tab>But if I meet her wearin' my usual duds, she'll reject me without a second thought!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_008<tab>最後に一度だけでいい！
あの人に、俺の気持ちを伝えたいんだ……！
でも今の俺じゃ……あの色男と並んだだけで負けちまう。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_009<tab>I need a fightin' chance! I need you two to do what you do best an' make me the finest clothes you can!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_009<tab>頼む、俺が胸をはって、あの人の前に立てるような
最高の洋服を作ってくれないか！？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_010<tab>One would have to possess a heart of stone to refuse an impassioned plea like that. Wouldn't you agree, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_010<tab>ここまで頼まれるなんて、裁縫師冥利につきるわね。
ワワルッカちゃんの魅力を、めいっぱい引き出す
とびっきりのお洋服を作ってあげましょうよ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_011<tab>If we are to send him against Mamajaru, we must furnish him with such garments as befit his passion.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_011<tab>そうね……ママジャルぼっちゃまに対抗するなら
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3215)) 01 /var>」に、
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3475)) 01 /var>」をあわせて……

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_012<tab>Prepare a pair of patrician's bottoms, a patrician's wedge cap, and a patrician's coatee. I will see to his gloves and shoes. Each piece must be flawless, without exception. Together, we shall fashion a suit of armor for our young warrior.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_012<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2895)) 01 /var>」をかぶってもらいましょ！
靴や手袋は、私が用意するから。
あなたは、最高のお洋服を全力で作ってちょうだい！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_013<tab>Thank you both so much! I...I know I won't fail with you two on my side!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_013<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……
頼んだぞ……俺を……男にしてくれっ！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_020<tab>Please hurry, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I've gotta say my piece before it's too late!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_020<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>……
頼んだぞ……俺を男にしてくれ！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_030<tab>I trust you understand what's at stake, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Bring me a pair of patrician's bottoms, a patrician's wedge cap, and a patrician's coatee of the finest quality.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_030<tab>「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3215)) 01 /var>」に、
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　3475)) 01 /var>」をあわせて
「<var 28 ((ItemHQ)) ((　2895)) 01 /var>」をかぶってもらいましょ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_40<tab>Your garments are ready, good sir. Allow me to assist you.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_40<tab>さあ、ワワルッカちゃん、着てみてちょうだい。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_041<tab>Gods almighty, is this really me...?
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_42<tab>If I may be so bold, I think this is quite possibly our finest work yet!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_42<tab>……はあ、ほれぼれしちゃう、
こんなに素敵なお洋服、初めて見たわ。
ワワルッカちゃん、とっても格好いいわよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_043<tab>I feel like I'm someone else, like a prince at a fancy ball, or─
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_043<tab>すごいな、俺じゃないみたいだ……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_44<tab>Hah! Sir, I have known princes. I am pleased to say that you are <var 1A 02 /var>nothing<var 1A 01 /var> like they.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_44<tab>ワワルッカちゃんが素敵だから、お洋服が似合うのよ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_045<tab>Big Rose, I...I don't know what to say. Thank you. I think I'm finally ready to see Kokomo.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_045<tab>ありがとう。
俺、早速ココモさんのところに行って……

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_046<tab>Ah, yes. About that─I would advise you to make haste. I suspect Mamajaru will make his intentions known ere long.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_046<tab>あ、言っておくけど
ココモちゃんは、お店にいないわよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_047<tab>What!? Are you sure!?

TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_048<tab>I cannot say for certain, but a little bird tells me that Mamajaru and Kokomo are at present in the Gold Court. An ideal location for a romantic proposal, wouldn't you agree?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_048<tab>「ゴールドコート」で、
ママジャルぼっちゃまとデート中よ。
ワワルッカちゃん、ふたりの邪魔する勇気はある？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_049<tab><gasp> I gotta hurry, while there's still time! Thanks, Big Rose!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_049<tab>だ……大丈夫だっ！
それでも、俺は、ココモさんに想いを伝える！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, be a dear and follow him. I would very much like to know how this all plays out.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_050<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>ちゃん
彼の後を追ってちょうだい。
結果はどうあれ……見届けたら、必ず私に教えてね！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_060<tab>And then the idiot had the gall to say that I knew nothing of business! To which I replied, of course I don't─why bother when you know the men who <var 1A 02 /var>own<var 1A 01 /var> them!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_060<tab>……でさ、オレは言ったわけ。
オレは修行なんかしなくっても商売できるんだって。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_061<tab>Uh...
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_062<tab>When I speak to you, I expect your full attention! I'll teach you how to behave, woman!
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_062<tab>なんだよ、オレの話をちゃんと聞けよ。
お前は、オレの妻になるんだろ？
おとなしく従ってろ！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_063<tab>No, don't!
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_064<tab>How dare you raise your hand against a lady!
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_065<tab>Kokomo, are you alright?
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_066<tab>Do...do I know you, sir?
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_067<tab>It's me, Kokomo. Wawarukka. I made a few deliveries to your father's shop. Not recently, I suppose, but─
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_067<tab>俺です、ワワルッカです。
お父さんの店に原石を納品している……

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_068<tab>Wawarukka!? But...why are you here? And why are you dressed like that?
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_068<tab>嘘、ワワルッカさん？
どうしてこんな……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_069<tab>For you, Kokomo. There's somethin' I've been meanin' to tell you─
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_069<tab>あなたに想いを伝えたくて、
それで、必死に自分を変えようと……。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_070<tab>I don't know who you are, but you will turn around and face me right this─
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_070<tab>オレを無視するな！
このっ……！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_071<tab>Y-You've made a powerful enemy today, my friend!
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_MAMAJARU_071<tab>……オレに逆らって、タダですむと思うなよ！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_072<tab>I've never seen anyone stand up to Mamajaru like that before...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_072<tab>ありがとうございます。
あなたは、私のために……
こんなに変わってくれたんですね。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_073<tab>I s'pose they lacked the proper motivation.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_073<tab>はい……
俺、ずっと前から、ココモさんと話したくて。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_074<tab>I was hoping you would come visit again. But then you kept wearing such strange outfits...
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_074<tab>私も、ずっと前から
あなたとお話がしたいって思ってたんです。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_075<tab>Promise me you won't do that again.
target: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_KOKOMO_075<tab>あなたのこと……聞かせてくれますか？

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_WAWARUKKA_076<tab>A-As you wish.
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_080<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Tell me everything.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_080<tab>どうだった、ワワルッカちゃんの告白は？
そう……なんとか、うまくいきそうね。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_081<tab>Hah! I would have liked to have seen that.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_081<tab>うふふ、ワワルッカちゃんが、
告白する気になったときのために、
お得意様からデートコースを聞き出しておいてよかったわ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_082<tab>Hm? How did I learn of Mamajaru's plans, you ask? From the man himself, of course. He's not the sort to keep his grand designs private.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_082<tab>いい仕事をしたわね、<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>。
ワワルッカちゃんが告白できたのは
あなたの作った服のおかげよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_083<tab>Do not misunderstand. I am not some rank sentimentalist. I have acted only in my capacity as a weaver to help a client─just as you have.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_083<tab>立派な服に勇気をもらったから、
ココモちゃんに自信をもって声をかけられたの。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_084<tab>As for our young couple...well, to be frank, calling them a couple is a tad premature. Babawai will doubtless have objections given Wawarukka's modest origins. Nevertheless, I think our young gentleman has finally found the courage to stand up for himself.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_084<tab>あのふたりは、もう大丈夫でしょ。
この先、お父さんの反対とか、色々ありそうだけど……
あなたの作った服が、乗り越える強さを与えるはずよ。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_085<tab>You should be proud. This could be the beginning of a beautiful relationship─one which would owe much to your skill.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_085<tab>お洋服を着た人の魅力を
最大限引き出して幸せにする……
それが裁縫師の一番大事な仕事なの。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_086<tab>Well done, <var 08 E905 ((Mistress)) ((Master)) /var> <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 03 /var>. Well done indeed.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_REDOLENTROSE_086<tab>私からも、お礼を言わせてちょうだい。
ありがとう、あなたは最高の裁縫師よ！！

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TALK_SCENE00006_000<tab>
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_TALK_SCENE00007_000<tab>

TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_500<tab>This concludes the weaver quests for FINAL FANTASY XIV: A Realm Reborn. In order to undertake the next series of quests, you must first meet the following requirements:
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_500<tab>「裁縫師」の物語が、ひとつの区切りを迎えました！
次の「裁縫師」のクラスクエストを開始するためには、
以下の条件を満たす必要があります。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_501<tab>※ You must have completed the main scenario quest “Before the Dawn.”
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_501<tab>1.「メインクエスト：第七星暦ストーリー」の、
　「希望の灯火」を完了する。

source: TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_502<tab>Once you have done so, the next weaver quest will be available from Redolent Rose.
target:
TEXT_CLSWVR500_00654_SYSTEM_085_502<tab>条件を満たし、裁縫師ギルドの、
「レドレント・ローズ」に話しかけ、
新たなクラスクエストを開始しましょう！
